title: Wow
review: Just amazing. Does not get much better than that. Jason Bourne vs batman in the street with wonderbread! Amazin!

title: I appreciated it
review: I like how you have to keep your mind alert in these films...especially this one. Cumberbatch is a masterful actor and brings so much to the table in all of his projects. I will enjoy this movie everytime that I watch it

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: JJ has done and can do so much better
review: I dont k ow what to say...dont know how it made past the editing room. If you are a SW fan...then you have e to watch it...just...dont have high expectatons

title: I cant get enough
review: Watched it at least 6 times now. Its sooo good. Just job well done

title: Surprised
review: When they started remaking all of these Disney movies, I was nervous. Some of them have been huge misses...but this one was good. I am sure that I will watch it again, I like Will Smith's take on the genie. It's good that he did not copy the original...I dont think anybody could due the late Mr. William's justice if they tried.

title: Definitely not the same...but close enough
review: Some of the subtle changes did not sit well with me. Nice to see James Ealr Jones reprise his role. Will watch again. But in the future inwish that they would leave it where it was.

title: Refreshing
review: Seen it many times..maybe I am a sap for the respect shown between the characters and the devout dedication to the traditions...or maybe I am a love sick loser...who knows...none the less...great movie

title: Ground breaking!
review: This movie was so well put together. Writing, directing and acting was unparalleled! Just brilliant.

title: Never gets old.
review: Dont know how many times I have seen it...and I cannot believe that it is about to be 16 yrs old!!!! Ef me. But it's still hilarious. Love watching it with my kids
